overview: Add instant ambience to all your Halloween activities with the specialty video.  Scary your trick-or-treaters, decorate your window and live in your parties. The virtual pumpkin is one hour of six ghoulish, fullscreen jack-o'-lanterns. Shot entirely on film and back for the hunting original soundtrack, it's guaranteed to become a Halloween experience that people of all ages but want to enjoy year after year!
title: The Virtual Pumpkin
